desc.value: To ensure a smooth journey, these specialized vehicules are often used to transport the precious Spice on long flights.
To ensure a smooth journey, these specialized vehicules are often used to transport the precious Spice on long flights.

A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.

The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-product such a vehicle.

The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.

A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
Troopers are fierce melee fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
Armed with medium-range projectile weapons, rangers are best used alongside defensive units that can protect them.
Equipped with rocket launchers, these specialists can easily breach enemy defenses and open the way for other units.
This heavy, remote-controlled drone is well suited for combat, but its primary purpose is to provide field support to nearby units.
The Wardens are the Atreides' elite section. Equipped with heavy-duty armor, shields and swords, they are ready to give their lives to defend their allies.
Fashioned after the heraldic bird of House Atreides, the Hawk harasses weakened enemies with its two machine guns.
This utility frigate has heavy shielding and a large cabin area to keep wounded troops out of harms way. They will live to fight another day.
One of Leto's most trusted men and House Atreides' Swordmaster, Duncan was tasked with being Leto's ambassador to the Fremen upon their arrival on Arrakis.

Warmaster and poet, Gurney's indefectible loyalty and long service to House Atreides earned him the status of valued friend and confident. While not exactly a handsome man, his combined abilities to sing and fight without missing a note make him both a charismatic and fearsome figure.

A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.

The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-product such a vehicle.

The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.

A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
These rank and file troops are widely used by the Harkonnens, with little regard for their survival as long as they can further their goals.
These Harkonnen specialists use demolition charges and various explosives to stun and disorient their targets, reducing their efficiency.
A special section of Harkonnen fanatics, trained from birth to value success at all costs over survival.
On the verge of defeat, a Cerberus takes a potent blend of stimulants that pushes them to hysterical strength and debilitating frenzy. At that point, survival is no longer an option.

This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.

This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.

This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.

This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.

This lightweight, remote-controlled flying device is outfitted with small-caliber guns to assist other units in combat. Thanks to its small stature and reduced noise, it has the ability to stay concealed from a distance.
These hulking killing machines, clad in heavy armor and equipped with ever-regenerating shields, feel seemingly impossible to take down, although they are not fully invulnerable.
These creepy, undulating crafts bring a large amount of firepower to the fight. They spray missiles at an area without much care for precision.
Behind its many eyes and heavy shielding, the Overlord frigate hides a self-repairing fleet of vicious drone-ships.
A small vicious flying drone controlled from the inside of the [H_Frigate].

Nicknamed "the Beast" after murdering his own father, the Count of Lankiveil is every bit as evil and corrupt as his uncle, the Baron Harkonnen. Rabban only rules through violence and terror, making him a dreaded and despised, leader.
Iakin is the Captain of the House Harkonnen guard. While regarded as decently reliable while on duty, he is a known Semuta addict, which, to some, is enough to cast doubt on all of his abilities.
Feigning fidelity for years, these [Harkonnen-adjective] agents stay dormant, until the right trigger presents itself.

A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.

The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-product such a vehicle.

The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.
The Fremen Harvesting Team is very efficient at gathering [Spice], and more importantly, at avoiding the dreaded [Sandworm].
The Fremen Harvesting Team is very efficient at gathering [Spice], and more importantly, at avoiding the dreaded [Sandworm].
These Fremen fighters are adept at maintaining a high efficiency in the harsh, arid environments of Arrakis. Dune is their homeworld, and they will always defend it.
This demolition squad specializes in destroying enemy vehicles.
Stealthy units specializing in melee combat, able to exploit weaknesses in the enemies' armor and striking where it hurts most.

Fremen had to adapt their strategies to fight increasingly armored invaders. A small team wielding stolen offworld artillery can wreak havoc into enemies' air units, while remaining discret and fast enough to evade the retribution.

Fremen had to adapt their strategies to fight increasingly armored invaders. A small team wielding stolen offworld artillery can wreak havoc into enemies' air units, while remaining discret and fast enough to evade the retribution.
The elite Fremen warriors are completely fearless and dreaded by all. No unit is better fitted for skirmishes in the desert, even when grossly outnumbered.
Made from an ornithopter carcass, the Spire differentiate itself by its superior firepower.
Made from odds and end of many ships, this aeronef can be customized to meet the needs of its makers.

Chani is a young Fremen mothered by the famous imperial planetologist Liet Kynes. A bold and charismatic woman and an adept fighter, she is loyal to her native people and is determined to do whatever it takes to remove any lingering Harkonnen presence from her planet.

Otheym is a renowned and fearsome Fremen fighter who left Sietch Gara Kulon for Sietch Tabr led by Stilgar. A wise and loyal if a bit gruff man, he likes to be in the first lines, be it in combat or through experimenting with new kinds of strategies.

A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.

The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-produce such a vehicle.

The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.

A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
Scavengers will offer their services to the highest bidder. This doesn't mean they are devoid of all ethics, but it certainly means that their loyalty has a cost and no strings attached.
Plunderers who specialize in the use of drugs and chemical weapons, not only damaging enemy units, but also spoiling their supplies and poisoning their food.
These lightweight units know when to strike. Their specialty is ambushing units stranded in the desert and already in a bad spot.
These remote-controlled utility machines will help gather lost equipment on the battlefield, and turn them into useful weapons.
Highly trained warriors and assassins, using stealth to strike when one least expects them.
This stealth recon ship has been equipped with the pride of smuggler electro-magnetic weaponery.
This old chemical lab station has been repurposed for warfare. Continuously releasing heavy gases on the battefield, the Wraith induces terror in the hearts of everyone who crosses its path.
Drisq is Esmar Tuek's loyal quartermaster, managing supplies and commodities for the whole Sietch. She is also regularly involved in the logistics of her master's smuggling operations.
Bannerjee serves as the head of security at Tuek's Sietch. A stout, intimidating hulk of a man with a jaded outlook on life, he is a reliable ally when it comes to protecting Esmar's best interests.
Plunderers who specialize in the use of drugs and chemical weapons, not only damaging enemy units, but also spoiling their supplies and poisoning their food.
An odd bunch of plunderers, pirates and smugglers who are in for easy, albeit dangerous, money.
These maurauders are equipped with rifles and prefer to fight from a distance.
These maurauders are equipped with grenades and prefer to fight from a distance.
Scavengers will offer their services to the highest bidder. This doesn't mean they are devoid of all ethics, but it certainly means that their loyalty has a cost and no strings attached.

A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.

The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-product such a vehicle.

The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.

A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.
These shock troops are equipped with a device that throws burning napalm. This terrible weapon brings agonizing death to its target and awful nightmares to those who see it in action.

Once stabilized, these remote-controlled mobile artilleries rain deafening shells on even well-defended positions. Make sure to keep the enemy away from them, as they are quite vulnerable at close range.

Once stabilized, these remote-controlled mobile artilleries rain deafening shells on even well-defended positions. Make sure to keep the enemy away from them, as they are quite vulnerable at close range.
Elite troops of the Empire, the Sardaukar are widely considered the best fighters in the universe.
The Hammer is a specialized bomber of the Imperium, designed to deliver high-caliber explosives with frightening precision and break any defensive position.
The Cronos is a symbol of the Imperium's power. It is equipped with powerful flanking cannons and the full infrastructure necessary to land shuttles.
The Cronos is a symbol of the Imperium's power. It is equipped with powerful flanking cannons and the full infrastructure necessary to land shuttles.

Wensicia is the third daughter of Shaddam IV. She is trained in stewardship and takes care of much of the day to day logistics of the imperial palace. Her impulsiveness often causes trouble, but brings her to rapid success even more often.
These beast are genetically modified feline controlled remotely through brain implants. They could be trained to murder children, but who would do such an unethical thing?

Captain Aramsham is a proud Sardaukar officer, used to wielding authority over his subordinates, conscripts of the Landsraad and Sardaukar alike. Pragmatic and experienced, he is often put in charge of dangerous operations, which he always returns victorious from.
Conscripts are fierce fighters. They become stronger when supported by specialized units.

A very common type of transport vessel, the ornithopter is a jet-propelled vehicle whose articulated wings help to improve maneuvrability and ensure stability. They are primarily used as reconnaissance vehicles.
This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.

The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-produce such a vehicle.

The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.

A bulky, mobile factory-like building that harvests Spice Melange from Spice fields. Due to their structure and functionality, harvesters generate a great deal of vibrations which are bound to attract [Sandworm].
The squires have sworn to serve Ecazi nobility. They are used to taking the biggest blows from enemy forces, and focus on softening defences for stronger units to steal the show.

[Ecaz-longname] employs a lot of professional hunters, to keep the large game population of their home planet in check, feed the court, and provide diversion. During war times, they are often hired to chase a very different quarry.
Fencers trained all day, every day to be the best duelist in the universe. On the battlefield, they often take the heat off of their lesser peers.

A good banner is not just a piece of fabric. It's an embodiement of everything one fights for. As long as the War Banner stands, [Ecaz-longname]'s unique blend of style and honor shall be felt by all on the battlefield.
Ecazi nobility prides itself on its bravery and martial prowess. It is customary for young nobles to follow the path of the knight, to demonstrate in the fray that they indeed possess such qualities.

The Siren's elegant form and graceful flight hides a dangerous anti-material weapon. It emits colorful patterns and focused noises toward its target, saturating sensors and softening defenses of drones and ships.
The Monument of Eternal Grace is a representation of the flowing nature of Art, a demonstration of Ecazi craftmanship, and a powerful weapon of war, all rolled into one.
Whitmore Bludd was a renowned instructor at the Ginaz swordmaster school. After the fall of Ginaz, he entered the service of House Ecaz, first as Ilesa's bodyguard, and then as warmaster.

Ilesa is the second daughter of Armanda. Having barely survived an assassination attempt at the onset of adulthood, losing an arm and an eye in the process, Ilesa has grown into a bitter and serious woman, with no qualms about using her infirmity to guilt people into doing her bidding.
A real star always has an entourage.

The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis, as well as many other secret abilities.
This ornithopter has seen better days. The wings are bent and the engine is barely functionning. Hopefully, you can still get just a little bit of mileage from its old carcass.

The Ixians have used their craft to create this cutting-edge ornithopter. It flies faster, quieter, and farther than a traditionnal one, using only the power of the sun, a resource in abundance on Arrakis. It will be years before we can mass-produce such a vehicle.

The Ixians have stuffed this ornithopter with all kind of captors and data collecting devices to study the effect of Arrakis on its cability. It's a bit slower, and cannot really operate properly, but they are confident that the collected data will be valuable.
Sifting the sand delicately to not attract [Sandworm]s, the combine harvester is a marvel of Ixian technology. It is piloted fully remotely, making [Spice] gathering a safe and pleasant activity.
Sifting the sand delicately to not attract [Sandworm]s, the combine harvester is a marvel of Ixian technology. It is piloted fully remotely, making [Spice] gathering a safe and pleasant activity.

Self-learning combat drones using a shifting repertoire of deadly moves. First designed to train the Ixian nobility in close combat, the fighting meks have been increasingly integrated into Vernius military forces.

Suboids are a race of humans genetically designed for manual labor. They are diligent and methodical, but lack any capacity for imagination and creativity. They can occasionally participate in warfare when the need arises.
Railgun Drones fire a projectile accelerated with an electromagnetic coil. These high-tech weapons can reach marginally better projectile speeds than regular firearms, if the cannon is long enough.

The Resonance Drone induces a self-repeating electrical feedback loop in its Holtzman Coil, charging nearby Faraday cages with a powerful electrostatic effect. This stratagem has been used by Ixian armies for centuries.
Drones can help repel an assault as well as any weapons. These drones are even piloted through the Nodal Network.

Fight-Engineers are a caste of Ixian specialists constantly trying to improve the programming of fighting drones. They often appear on the front, where they can provide emergency repairs or take direct control of the drone army.

Fight-Engineers are a caste of Ixian specialists constantly trying to improve the programming of fighting drones. They often appear on the front, where they can provide emergency repairs or take direct control of the drone army.
The Spirit's conditional camouflage lets it step in and out of the shadows to surprise an unsuspecting opponent, or feint an assault.

The Folder Relay is the first ship of its kind. Used as a support ship during planetary warfare, it integrates a full Space Folder making it theoretically capable of instant interstellar travel. In practice it is used for short range teleportation for retreat or maneuvers.

Nuwa is the brillant automation engineer behind a lot of recent breakthroughs in self-learning drone technology. Her latest project is taking place on Arrakis and she will personally make sure that everything goes according to plan.

C'Tair is the son of Cammar Pilru. During the suboid revolt, he remained on Ix where he single-handedly led a resistance movement that eventually overthrew the tleilaxu oppressors. The experience has tainted C'Tair with terrible trauma, but also taught him to defend his home with all his strength.

Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.

Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.

Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.

Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.

Coming from outer space, the Renegades operate outside of the Faufreluche class system. They hitch on the Spacing Guild ships without paying their dues, and loot any vulnerable planets they land upon.
These villagers decided to rebel against the oppressing authorities and are now conducting a revolt.
These villagers decided against rebelling against the oppressing authorities and have now been brainwashed into fighting for their oppressor.
Raiders have a profound love for their home planet Arrakis and hate to see it fall into outlander hands. They will stop at nothing to claim it back.
Raiders have a profound love for their home planet Arrakis and hate to see it fall into outlander hands. They will stop at nothing to claim it back.
Raiders have a profound love for their home planet Arrakis and hate to see it fall into outlander hands. They will stop at nothing to claim it back.
Raiders have a profound love for their home planet Arrakis and hate to see it fall into outlander hands. They will stop at nothing to claim it back.
An odd bunch of plunderers, pirates and smugglers who are in for easy, albeit dangerous, money.
These maurauders are equipped with rifles and prefer to fight from a distance.
These maurauders are equipped with grenades and prefer to fight from a distance.
In their line of work, not many men make it to an age ripe enough to call themselves veterans. When they do, they should not be taken lightly.
In their line of work, not many men make it to an age ripe enough to call themselves veterans. When they do, they should not be taken lightly.
[Landsraad-longname] maintains a professional troop of peacekeepers, that are only lent to the most favored houses.
The honor guard of [Landsraad-longname] is rarely seen on the field, but they are fearsome fighters nonetheless.
In exceptional cases where [Landsraad-longname] needs to take diciplinary action, some guards are trained to use powerful siege equipment.
These Fremen fighters are adept at maintaining a high efficiency in the harsh, arid environments of Arrakis. Dune is their homeworld, and they will always defend it.
This demolition squad specializes in destroying enemy vehicles.
The elite Fremen warriors are completely fearless and dreaded by all. No unit is better fitted for skirmishes in the desert, even when grossly outnumbered.
Elite troops of the Empire, the Sardaukar are widely considered the best fighters in the universe.

Some people are just looking for a fight. If they belong to a Landsraad house that is currently at peace, they might become legionaries, going to war on distant front, for allies of their liege house.
Backwards fremen have fallen into a perversion of the old Zensunni ways. They see any bond as weakness, and violence as the only proper way of life on Arrakis.
Backwards fremen have fallen into a perversion of the old Zensunni ways. They see any bond as weakness, and violence as the only proper way of life on Arrakis.
Backwards fremen have fallen into a perversion of the old Zensunni ways. They see any bond as weakness, and violence as the only proper way of life on Arrakis.
A village's militia is comprised of various civilians who may lack combat training, but not enthusiasm.
Members of the militia equipped with guns and therefore able to fight from a distance.
Militia using explosives to wreck havoc in enemy lines or destroy their vehicles.
Some militia have previous combat training and automatically become veterans of sorts.
[Landsraad-longname] maintains a professional troop of peacekeepers, that are only lent to the most favored houses.
The honor guard of [Landsraad-longname] is rarely seen on the field, but they are fearsome fighters nonetheless.

Contracts with assassins are common in the Imperium. But succeeding in reaching the Great Houses always requires a lot more logistics.
